original_text: But every vow of a widow, and of her that is divorced, wherewith they have bound their souls, shall stand against her.
korean_text: 과부나 이혼 당한 여자의 서원이나 그가 결심한 모든 서약은 지킬 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But every vow of a widow
and of her that is divorced
wherewith they have bound their souls
